channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
hey I need some help on my compile. I have this code in it.
@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_06\bin\javac.exe" *.java -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin*.java src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\content\skill\*.java src\server\content\*.java src\server\model\*.java pause cls Compile.bat pause
and this pops up in my cmd. javac: file not found: *.java
So my question is, How do i make it find *.java ?

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @deatharmy deatharmy
item.description:
@deatharmy wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

----> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,557965.msg4081924.html#msg4081924

meh didn’t help me but thanks for trying. I just found out the compiler is too old.

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @deatharmy deatharmy
item.description:
@deatharmy wrote:

hey I need some help on my compile. I have this code in it.

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_06\bin\javac.exe” .java -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin.java src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java src\server\content\skill*.java src\server\content*.java src\server\model*.java
pause
cls
Compile.bat
pause

and this pops up in my cmd.
javac: file not found: *.java

So my question is, How do i make it find *.java ?
